title: Cpu shutting off messing with my game queue
body:
I understand why I was placed in a lower priority Queue and I am not complaining about that, its a good punishment for AFK/DC players. But I am not one of those players of my own will; I love LoL and I don't ever quit matches. My CPU randomly shuts off, and I don't mean sleeps. It shuts off like it got unplugged or something but it didn't. 

Full black screen, game completely off. I have to go back to LoL and reconnect; Its happened around 3-4 times now and I am really getting annoyed. 

I don't know why it is doing this because I have a really nice CPU, and its a very good one for gaming. 

Everytime my CPU shuts off I turn it back on and it has an error message thing. It says "Rear chassis not detected" And then a bunch of other stuff I cant remember atm. 
Any way to fix that? 

I don't wanna be punished for something I cant control after this time.  

All comments welcome! 

{{champion:103}}

replies.body:
It sounds like there's a pretty serious issue, maybe hardware, that's causing your PC to shutdown as a security precaution.  To clarify your concerns about [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), the system treats all leaves equally regardless of intent because it still causes negative experiences.  I suggest reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to help determine why you're having these shutdowns.

Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs to your ticket for context.  We cannot remove leaverbuster queues, but we can look into the crash.  We'll reply back asap.
